message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Can you consider that?
I can see you're serious about buying the product, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit further. How about we meet at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. I'm still a bit shy of my target price. Can you consider $128?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're trying to negotiate a good deal. I'll meet you at $132, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $132, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. Can you consider $125?
I'm starting to feel like we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $129, but I'm willing to meet you halfway between $129 and $125. How about we meet at $127?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not sure if $127 is the best deal. I'm willing to walk away if I don't get a good price. Can you consider $125 one last time?
